Reasoning Traceability.description: The ability to follow the logical reasoning and steps taken to arrive at the final answer.

accepted_values.partial: A partial reasoning trace is provided, but some steps or logic are unclear.
accepted_values.complete: A complete and clear reasoning trace is provided for all steps.

Solution Accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided with respect to the question asked.

accepted_values.partially_correct: The solution is partially correct but incomplete or has minor errors.

Diversity and Complexity Coverage.description: The extent to which the solution covers diverse and complex aspects inherent in the task.

accepted_values.low: The solution covers only simple or a limited range of aspects.
accepted_values.medium: The solution covers a moderate range of diverse and complex aspects.
accepted_values.high: The solution thoroughly covers a wide range of diverse and complex aspects.

Internet Independence.description: The degree to which the solution can be derived without reliance on plain text answers from the internet.

accepted_values.dependent: The solution is derived from plain text found directly on the internet.
accepted_values.partially_independent: The solution references the internet but also demonstrates independent reasoning or computations.
accepted_values.independent: The solution is independent of internet search results and demonstrates original reasoning or computations.

Steps Completeness.description: Whether all the required steps to reach the answer have been successfully completed.

accepted_values.incomplete: Some required steps are missing or not executed.
accepted_values.mostly_complete: Most of the required steps are completed with minor gaps.
accepted_values.complete: All required steps are successfully completed.
